body: Holy Shit! Reading this was totally worth it haha! I really like this kind of mystery where the story and conclusion is quite vague.... 10/10 (つ≧▽≦)つ

And continuing
3)At page 147 the girl said "You doubted my existence... But you, Do you think you are real?" It defy my number 2 theory wtf so the last all i can think about is he is not real or he is on the other world many possibilities that the author left here i know many author like this left a big huge question mark. and then saying that there is so many possibilities in the end but i will leave to your imagination it said so i will not stress myself even more but atleast he have the chance to tell his feelings for his childhood friend that's a man!

At the start of the final arc the childhood friend i'm seriously crying wtf and at the end it keeps me a hole in my heart and left unanswered. Many possibilities that he is on coma or he is just playing the role play genre game that he bought and here are my theories.
1)On page 126 the girl said he is in coma when the mc played the game i think at that point he is just playing the game because the other him is not been on coma before! I don't see anyone said he's been coma so i can only conclude that him on that world is just a in game character like him. 
2)page 146 the mc turn on the pc you can see the yuka with a black hair version of his childhood friend we can say that he is not on another universe or something but i think the author made it look like he is on other world when playing game so we will all be confuse!

I fucking hate this, all of that build up to not give me the damn answer. I'm going to find this author and burn him alive. Also, she better not have fucked that other guy who gave her the flowers. To hell with this shit, he should have stayed in the other world with the childhood friend who loved him.
My dissapointment is immeasurable... And my day is ruined
Oh shoot, Someone said something similair to what I said

I guess the game makes him transfer through universes or a different world into a different body where things are different. When he transfers to his other body the other one will seem to be in a coma. So in that other world that one girl is her childhood friend. I got this in the one scene when he clicks on the thing and goes back to the main world, he seemed to had fell asleep.
I think I kinda understand this ending
i hope anyone with 300 iq can explain this ending.
Fuck this shit. I just got into existential crisis

And her response was...Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you
lol i though that was real phew

Based on the last page, he was asleep while with the blonde one, same principle as waking up from the black haired one, so maybe he exists in both? The body he doesn't occupy being comatose since his conscience is in the other? Lucky to have nice childhood friends either way though, lucky fucker.
So, can anyone tell me what's with the ending? Which is the game, seeing how the blonde yuka is holding his body, does that mean black haired yuka is the game? Someone tell me!
it feels really good till the ending... he should just stay in the game...
